attributes.action: Suspend MP’s pay from the 29th March 2019 until they agree a deal for Brexit.
attributes.background:
The government have had 2 years to get a deal. Now in the final weeks we still have no deal and an extension to A50. Force the MP’s to do what was voted for by the people that pay their salaries.

Similar to the US shutdown this will force the MP’s to stop bickering and trying to prevent Brexit.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
